overview: Claus Schalper has a solid background in financial management, combined with practical experience of raising financing and driving business growth. He holds a masters degree in Business Administration from the University of Bamberg, Germany. Mr Schalper began his career with Arthur Andersen in the Audit and Corporate Finance Department. Subsequently, he grew a start-up company in the area of healthcare IT software as general partner and shareholder. Following the trade-sale of this company Claus Schalper served as a part-time consultant to venture capitalists specialising in seed-financing, and as Head of Controlling at Wire Card AG.
